description: Try our easy to follow Barbecue Chicken & Noodle Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Barbecue Chicken & Noodle Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add chicken meat and simmer for 2 minutes or until heated through. Add lemon juice and season to taste. Ladle soup into bowls, top with lemon slices and sprinkle with reserved dill tops to serve. Note: you will need a Barbecue Chicken for this recipe
